row.scheme:
;;;;StagedDelete (if (Appending?) (d-MoveCursorLeft)) (if (Music?) (if (d-GetNonprinting) ;;; non-printing (if (d-GetNotes) (d-RemoveNoteFromChord) (d-DeleteObject))
;;; an ordinary black note or rest (if (d-GetNotes) (d-RemoveNoteFromChord) (d-SetNonprinting))) ;;; not a music object (d-DeleteObject)) (d-SetSaved #f) (d-RefreshDisplay)
row._tooltip: Deletes the object at/before the cursor. For Notes/Chords/Rests it deletes stage by stage. First it removes notes until just a non-printing rest remains, then deletes that.
